All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddressBean
Address bean, which stores the 1 address of User
AddressDaoInterface
Address Dao Interface.
AddressDaoMethods
Address Dao Implementation class.
AdminFilter
It checks if session is active and session type is of admin type (hence admin is logged in) and if it is admin type, it lets pass to servlet, else it will redirect to homepage or login page based on session.
AdminServlet
Admin servlet class.
AuthEmailServlet
This is called by ajax in registration page to check if email is already taken or not.
DaoConnectionClass
Dao connection singleton class.
DaoInterface
User Dao Interface.
DaoMethods
User Dao Implementation class.
DeleteServlet
It deletes the user based on user id clicked button by admin.
EditServlet
It fetches all the data of user based on email address when user or admin clicks edit profile.
HomepageFilter
This is homepage filter.
LoginFilter
This filter checks if session is null or not on the login page.
LoginServlet
It fetches the email and password from the database table and checks if this is user or admin, and redirects them to their respective page.
LogoutServlet
It invalidates the session, so user/admin cannot access their details or functionalities.
NewPasswordServlet
It changes new password based on given email address for forgot password page.
RegisterServlet
It registers the new user after checking the validation and redirects them to admin/login page based on session.
ResetPasswordServlet
It finds the user based on given email, birthdate and security answers from reset password page.
ShaEncryption
This class has passwordEnccryption method which returns encrypted password.
UpdateServlet
It updates the user details from given inputs from register jsp page.
UserBean
User Bean stores the all of the information filled by user
UserFilter
It checks if session is active or not.
UserInterface
This is User service interface.
UserService
User service implementation class.
Validation
This is validation class.
